description: The EU ruling on Google will be of great interest to privacy advocates in the U.S. Will Google and other search providers be forced to apply a uniform standard across the globe? Also, a look at Cisco's changing business model as it shifts to the cloud and invests in "The Internet of Things."
teaser: The EU ruling on Google will be of great interest to privacy advocates in the U.S. Will Google and other search providers be forced to apply a uniform standard across the globe? Also, a look at Cisco's changing business model as it shifts to the cloud and invests in "The Internet of Things."
byline: Noel King, Cintra Wilson, Mark Garrison, Rob Schmitz, Karen Clark and David Brancaccio
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday May 14, 2014
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday May 14, 2014
